skins.shipDescription: Colossus-class light aircraft carrier C Perseus (HMS Perseus.)
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Perseus, the Colossus-class light aircraft carrier. Sadly, I didn't enter service until the war had ended. Don't have much in the way of a reputation or experience as a result. Still, I'll try to do a good job. All right, is that good enough? *sigh*...
skins.acquisition: I'm Perseus, from the Royal Navy. You can pronounce it "Per-see-us" if you want though... Well, whatever. Are we done here? Great. Nice meeting you.
skins.login: There's some saying that goes, "the early bird catches the worm." ...If that's true, I guess you'd starve, Commander.
skins.details: The big mirror in my room? What about it? If I told you, "I just like mirrors," would that satisfy your curiosity?
skins.secretaryIdle1: If you need my help with something, just say it. You do need to try and accomplish it on your own first, though.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Work is like food, in a way; leave it sitting for too long and it goes bad. Just so you know.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I heard Yuubari and Akashi get up to fun experiments in the lab. I kind of wanna see one. Kind of.
skins.secretaryTouch: Maybe try finishing your work before you "chat me up" or "interview me" or however you wanna sugarcoat it?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You must really want a seat at the naval jailhouse dinner table, huh?

skins.shipDescription: I'm Perseus, I will be your nurse today. Use this button to call for me if you need anything... Yes? Did you need something?
skins.acquisition: I'm Perseus, I will be your nurse today. Use this button to call for me if you need anything... Yes? Did you need something?
skins.login: Honestly, I have no idea what sort of face to put on when pretending to be a nurse.
skins.details: I'm still learning, but I know how to give injections and stop a haemorrhage in theory. Can I practice my knowledge on you, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: It's noble to help those in need, but don't go overboard with it. What I'm trying to say is: unless you NEED my help, just make do on your own, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Now to practice turning a gravely injured person over... You, I'm gonna need you to lie on your back.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Nice new med tech. Commander, I want you to be my guinea pigC Excuse me, I mean, experiment assistant.
skins.secretaryTouch: You have a healthy look in your eyes, Commander.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You belong in the bed of a jail cell, not of a hospital.
